mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.status AS "status", a.version AS "version", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.type AS "type", a.content AS "content", a.name AS "name", a.email AS "email", a.phone AS "phone", a.workunit AS "workunit", a.ip AS "ip", a.re_user_id AS "reUser.id", a.re_date AS "reDate", a.re_content AS "reContent", u.name AS "reUser.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cms_guestbook( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, type, content, name, email, phone, workunit, ip, create_time, re_user_id, re_date, re_content, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 0, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{type}, #{content}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{workunit}, #{ip}, #{createTime}, #{reUser.id}, #{reDate}, #{reContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cms_guestbook SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, type = #{type}, content = #{content}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, workunit = #{workunit}, ip = #{ip}, create_time = #{createTime}, re_user_id = #{reUser.id}, re_date = #{reDate}, re_content = #{reContent} WHERE id = #{id}
